Articles.Content:
This is a realistic copy of the BAC Aerospatiale Concorde in KSP. The mods used are as follows:

Adjustable Landing Gear

B9 Aerospace

CoffeeIndustries

KashCorp Shared Assets

Kerbal Aircraft Expansion (KAX)

SXT-Stock eXTension

and stock parts.

Links to KerbalX page below (download mods there)

Feel free to post requests or share your crafts with me. I will be interested to see what else is around.

Thanks, Jeff.

http://kerbalx.com/juicyjeff/BAC-Concorde

Edited October 4, 2015 by JuicyJeff

Um... That's great but, I can't see it. There is also no link anywhere.

Also welcome to the forums! If you need help with anything, don't be afraid to ask.

YargJay9991

I hate to sound rude, but what is the point of putting something on the Spacecraft Exchange if you don't give us any pictures or a link to download it? We don't want to read a list of mods that the craft uses, we want to see what it looks like! We want to be able to download it to fly it for ourselves!

Can you please add some pictures and a DL? It's a common custom to do so.

Edited October 4, 2015 by pTrevTrevs
Typo

I think I found it on KerbalX. Here's the link http://kerbalx.com/juicyjeff/BAC-Concorde

Looks good.

EDIT: Um why did you comment yourself on KX?

Hi Guys.

Sorry about the links. I dont know what happened.

Anyway YargJay has it right. Im new so I dont know how to put up imgur albums but ill figure it out.

So yeah just follow this link http://kerbalx.com/juicyjeff/BAC-Concorde

Thanks.
